cards.name: Wrathwood Larch
cards.text: [(2)], Discard this [ARROWR] Create a Wild Shard and put it into your hand.

cards.name: Angel of Judgement
cards.text:
Flight

When another card you control enters a crypt from play, each opposing champion sacrifices a card.
cards.flavor: The flames of justice are stoked in the forge of truth.

cards.name: Army of Myth
cards.text:
This card's cost is 3+X+X

Create X random Unique troops, and put them into play.
cards.flavor: Those whose names have become legend do not believe in fate. They create their own destiny.

cards.name: Bastardspawn of Bokrug
cards.text:
Flight

When this deals damage to an opposing champion, bury the top half of their deck, rounded up.
cards.flavor: ...beneath the muck and mire, it slumbers...

cards.name: Brown Fox Scout
cards.text: While this is the top card of your deck, you can see and play the top card of your deck.
cards.flavor: She will see you coming long before you realize she is even there.

cards.name: Dreamsmoke Mystic
cards.text:
You can see the top card of your deck.

[(2)] [ARROWR] Put the top card of your deck on the bottom of your deck.
cards.flavor: "Sister Midnight and Dream, Thunderbird and Sands, Observer and Plainsrunner. They hold oblivion at bay. For now."

cards.name: Grim Assimilation
cards.text: Look at target opposing champion's hand.   Choose a revealed troop. Put it into your hand.

cards.name: Grim Harvester
cards.text:
Lifedrain, Swiftstrike

[(1)], Sacrifice another troop [ARROWR] This deals 1 damage to each opposing champion.

cards.name: Hatchery Cultivator
cards.text: If one or more Eggs would be put into an opposing champion's deck, put that many +1 instead.
cards.flavor: "Two hundred thousand years ago, an orc Raiding Party exploring the caverns of the world below the surface discovered the enormous lake of blood." -Arachnomicon 17

cards.name: Houndmaster of Ardevaas
cards.text:
Speed

At the end of your turn, if this is ready, create an Attack Dog and put it into play. Otherwise, create a Guard Dog and put it into play.
cards.flavor: To his trusty hound, every man is a king.

cards.name: Lanupaw, Prophet of Fate
cards.text:
When you play a prophesied card, Lanupaw gets +2[ATK]/+2[DEF].

Prophecy - When Lanupaw enters play, the next troop in your deck gets +2[ATK]/+2[DEF]. The next action in your deck gets cost -[(2)]. The next resource in your deck gets "Gain two charges."

cards.name: Myrym, Empress of the Crypt
cards.text: At the end of each turn, put all troops in crypts that died this turn into play under your control.
cards.flavor: "Life scorns death. Eternity is patient. Indeed, patient is eternity. Death scorns life." -Myrym

cards.name: Periwinkle
cards.text: When you play a card with cost [(5)] or greater, copy it. (If it has targets, you may choose new targets for the copy.)
cards.flavor: "William," Periwinkle insisted, "your life is so very brief! Do not add regret to it!"

cards.name: Pyresoul Summoner
cards.text:
[BASIC]: [(4)] [ARROWR] Create a Phantom and put it into play.

[BASIC]: [(4)] [ARROWR] Create a Blaze Elemental and put it into play.
cards.flavor: "Fire and the human soul have something in common: passion makes them stronger."

cards.name: Tempestuous Bladedancer
cards.text: Crush, Speed, Steadfast
cards.flavor: Some weep at the dance. Others bleed.

cards.name: Walking Calamity
cards.text:
Crush, Speed

This can't be interrupted.

When this dies, it deals 10 damage to each opposing champion and troop.

When this enters your crypt, put it into your deck.

cards.name: Windsinger, Master of the Hunt
cards.text:
Your resources replenish at the start of each opposing champion's turn.

When an opposing champion draws a card, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor: "When coyotle pups are born as twins, one will be a hero and one will be a trickster; I choose to be both." -Windsinger
